\!
 \equiv 
\!

d z \, z

\,
{\mathcal E}_{z}

\begin{equation}

& = &
%=
\left[
\left(
\openone
+
\frac{1}{2}
\,
{\mathcal E}_{\bf r}
 \right)
\,
V^{(<)} ({\bf r})
\right]
 \,
\theta (a-r) 
\nonumber
\\
& &
- g \,
\frac{ \Omega_{d-1}}{2}
\,
r^{d-2}
\,
\delta^{(d)} ({\bf r})
 \,
 \theta (r-a) 
\;  ,
\label{eq:time_rate_of_dilation_op_ddim_2D_ISP_reg}
\end{eqnarray}
